Detailed Description

3GPP 23.040 V5.1.0 [9.2.3.12] - Attention: This class is a wrapper over a data-stream (no data is copied). Only the anchor of the byte-stream is needed the initialize the access to the class members.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

General constructor for all possible validity period formats.

General constructor for all possible validity period formats.

ValidityPeriod::ValidityPeriod (  UINT8  data  ) 
 

This constructor implicit supposes that the validity period format is ValidityPeriodFormat::Relative (only one byte).

size of the whole ValidityPeriod

INT ValidityPeriod::GetTimeZone (   )  const
 

BOOLEAN ValidityPeriod::IsAbsolute (   )  const
 

Validity period is absolute in semi-octet representation. The representation of time uses the class CodedTimeStamp. Use function GetAbsoluteTime.

BOOLEAN ValidityPeriod::IsInSeconds (   )  const
 

Validity period is relative in integer representation, where values 1..255 represent 1..255 seconds. Value 0 is undefined and reserved for future use. Use function GetSeconds.

BOOLEAN ValidityPeriod::IsInvalid (   )  const
 

Validity period has no valid format or is not present.

BOOLEAN ValidityPeriod::IsPacked (   )  const
 

Validity period is as specified for the relative case (PackedTimePeriod). Use function GetPackedTimePeriod.

BOOLEAN ValidityPeriod::IsRelative (   )  const
 

Validity period is relative in semi-octet representation. The representation of time uses the class Time. Use function GetRelativeTime.

BOOLEAN ValidityPeriod::IsSingleShot (   )  const
 

The validity period shall be applicable to the single shot short message.

INT  time_zone = 0
